Title: 077: Finding the Right Data Science Company That Best Fits You
Description:
In this episode of the SuperDataScience Podcast, I chat with the Data Science and Analytics Headhunter, Richard Downes. You will learn the different CV practices, know the ways to leverage LinkedIn, and get valuable tips on how to prepare and answer tough interview questions.


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at www.superdatascience.com/77
